parameters.name: BucketName
parameters.description: The name of the OSS bucket.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: ObjectKeyList
parameters.description: The objects in the OSS bucket that you want to scan. You can specify up to 50 objects at a time.

parameters.name: ServiceRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the OSS bucket is located.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description:
The ID of the industry-specific classification template.

>  You can call the **DescribeCategoryTemplateList** operation to query industry-specific classification templates. If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the main template.
